name: Cranfield Aviation Training (PTY) LTD
about: Cranfield Aviation Training (PTY) LTD is a leading aviation training school in South Africa, accredited by the South African Civil Aviation Authority (SACAA) and other regional aviation authorities. Established in 1999, the school offers a wide range of aviation courses for flight crew, cabin crew, maintenance personnel, ground crew, and airport personnel. Cranfield provides both classroom-based and online e-learning courses, ensuring flexibility and convenience for its students. The school is committed to delivering quality training in accordance with regulatory standards, as well as non-regulated programs focused on safety, security, and service. With a team of experienced instructors and administrative staff, Cranfield Aviation Training is dedicated to enhancing aviation skills and knowledge, making it a trusted name in the industry. Located in Fourways, Johannesburg, Cranfield welcomes delegates from across the continent, fostering a diverse and inclusive learning environment.
services:
["Cabin Crew License
Cabin Type Rating
Flight Operations Officer
Instrument Rating
Instructor Rating"]
